website_summaries.verdict: A reliable PPI heartburn medicine that has earned a loyal customer base for being effective, easy to take, and affordable.
pros: PPI medication that's available in 15 milligram formula
Delayed-release capsules are easy to swallow and provide lasting relief for frequent heartburn as well as symptoms of GERD
cons: Only recommend for 14 days of use, at which time you should consult your medical provider if symptoms persist
May take several day to work

customer_reviews.title: Excellent medication for GERD
customer_reviews.text: Excellent medication for GERD, esophagus, stomach and upper intestine ulcers. This helps keep.me out of the hospital for blood transfusions because it helps with my acid reflux. It begins working in about ten minutes and when taken everyday, it stops my stomach from bleeding. I do have to use 30 mg instead of 15 mg but it is worth the fodt.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine T Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as Omeprazole
customer_reviews.text: It works, but almost every day I'd get a little bit of a heartburn flare up, not enough to get out the Tums or anything like I'd be without a PPI, but I rarely ever had that happen with Omeprazole. Another reviewer commented about a mood change while taking this medicine and I noticed that as well, I had bad mood swings, more than normal. When these are gone, I'm switching back to Omeprazole. I'll stick with what works best. I will say one thing I especially liked about these capsules: They are TINY, thus very EASY to SWALLOW!!
customer_reviews.author: Stosik

customer_reviews.title: They work as good as Prevacid
customer_reviews.text: I've taken Prevacid for several years. For whatever reason, I wasn't able ti find Prevacid available anywhere unless I wanted to pay $100+ per 42 ct pack. I have no idea what caused that but I decided to try these, less expensive ones instead. They work just as well as the Prevacid but cost a lot less. It controlled my symptoms just as quickly and thoroughly. It's a lot less expensive and works just as well
customer_reviews.author: mark pipetTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: How Can You Not Buy This?
customer_reviews.text: I have acid reflux so I take a pill for it every day. The everyday price for this item is always a few bucks below the store brand at almost every store and this item is exactly the same as what you get in a store label, it's all made by the same company. So it's a deal already. But every once in a while, Amazon cuts the price by a few dollars and it's a downright steal. When I see the lowball price, I stock up because the savings are huge. Same item, way lower price. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Mark E.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting relief!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has had trouble with heartburn for a long time. He's used to taking Ranitidine every day, often multiple times in a day. He tried this product and only has to take it once every 2-3 days. The 3-pack is super economical. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the name brand
customer_reviews.text: I have not felt any difference between the prescription, name brand and this brand. I recently had to go off this med for 10 days to do some testing and during that time was reminded me how well it is doing its job.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.57

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would have just packaged in one bottle instead of three. What a waste. The pills work as well as my prescription. My plan stopped covering it.
customer_reviews.author: morrow52

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem as effective as Prevacid
customer_reviews.text: From what I can tell from internet searches, apparently we can't get the name brand product currently due to some factory overhaul. I know they say there is no difference between generic and name brand drugs, but I don't seem to get the same relief from this as I did when I was using Prevacid. I hope they get back up and running soon.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for Acid Reflux and Burning Stomach
customer_reviews.text: My daughter suffers from an inflamed stomach and possible ulcers. It is essential that she take one of these timed release capsules at the beginning of each day to give her comfort from constant burning sensations. The lansoprazole provided in this brand is the best value I could find on the market, so I stocked up to always have it available. The ingredients are the same in higher priced brands, so this is my recommended choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jadda

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: Landoprazola works the best for me. I tried the Rantidine but it’s only 12 hours and wasn’t as effective either. You can’t buy this stuff in the store for this price and it ships quick. I don’t know why it comes in 3 bottles. I just pour them all into one seems a waste. Beyond that it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: As good as name brand
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this type of over the counter acid reducer for many years. First, name brand until I saw I had to keep taking it. I then saw I had to find a cheaper alternative. I was using a different generic until I found this one which is even less expensive. All works. All works the same. Only giving it a four stars because it doesn’t come in one bigger bottle. Comes in little ones. A pain in the rear when organizing medicine cabinet. Please make this available in bigger sizes bottles!!!!! That would be awesome. Thanks again Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonesie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement for Prevacid
customer_reviews.text: I was getting Prevacid from walmart for many years but they all of sudden quit selling it. I have no idea why. I asked a few different managers about it and they just said that they were out of stock. At four different walmart stores.... huh? Anyways, I switched to a few different brands and had no luck. I found this and it works just as good. I take one every other day and I have no heartburn.
customer_reviews.author: Kandace Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great value antacid
customer_reviews.text: I buy this antacid frequently and find it to be the most effective generic or name brand antacid I've tried. It works as well as name brand at a tiny fraction of cost. I do still have some acid issues, but I don't believe those are related to the quality of this product and still highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Works well consistently
customer_reviews.text: I have used multiple brands of lansoprazole, and this product works well consistently. I have found that some of the other drug store brands don't always work as well at controlling heartburn. This a very good value per pill, I've bought it a bunch of times, and I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Only one problem
customer_reviews.text: Great product - works as well as any other generic Prevacid, better price. Here's the one problem: I take this every day, so I do the Subscribe and Save option, so I don't have to re-order every month. The box has 3 bottles of 2 weeks each, 6 weeks of pills. The Subscribe and Save options are 1 month or 2 months. This doesn't make any sense!!!! I end up getting them every month, then piling up spare bottles until I turn the subscription off for a while, then starting it again when I run out. Which kind of eliminates the advantage of subscribing!
customer_reviews.author: A. Bender

customer_reviews.title: As good as brand name
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband, he said they are just as good as brand name. Hes been on heartburn/acid reflux prescribed by Dr. over 25 years!!
customer_reviews.author: LiL Bit Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work as well as it’s much more expensive non generic meds.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Having overindulged at Thanksgiving, I found this to be an excellent replacement for the very costly Prevacid. I had meant to take it prior to the meal but forgot. Took it just prior to bedtime (when I felt GERD coming on) and had a restful evening.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have had issues with house brands not working as well in the past. I highly recommend this item--it has worked well for me

customer_reviews.text: Been taking the brand name Prevacid for years and it has always worked. Not sure what this stuff is but definitely not the same effect for me as Prevacid. Based on my experience the capsules might as well contain corn starch.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic heartburn and was told to take a PPI daily for the rest of my life. Prevacid did not work for 24 hours! My doctor said to increas it to once every 18 hours. That worked but drove the cost up. I'm back on another PPI.

product_meta.title: Amazon Basic Care Lansoprazole Delayed Release Capsules, 15 mg, treats frequent heartburn, 42 Count
product_meta.description: Compare to the active ingredient of Prevacid 24 HR. Amazon Basic Care Lansoprazole Delayed Release Capsules, 15 mg, is a 14-day course of treatment for frequent heartburn (occurring more than 2 days a week). Not intended for immediate relief of heartburn, this drug may take 1 to 4 days for full effect. Heartburn is a painful, burning sensation in the lower chest or throat that occurs when stomach acid backs up. Amazon Basic Care Lansoprazole Delayed Release Capsules, 15 mg reduce heartburn by decreasing the amount of acid produced in the stomach.
feature_bullets: ACTIVE INGREDIENT: This product contains lansoprazole 15 mg, an acid reducer, which compares to the active ingredient in Prevacid 24 HR.

HEARTBURN TREATMENT: This delayed-release heartburn medicine is clinically proven to treat frequent heartburn. Heartburn is a painful, burning sensation in the lower chest or throat that occurs when stomach acid backs up.

ACID REDUCER: When taken as directed, Amazon Basic Care Lansoprazole Delayed Release Capsules, 15 mg reduce heartburn by deactivating acid-producing pumps in the stomach lining to inhibit acid production at the source.

14 DAYS: Although some people get complete relief within 24 hours; it may take 1 to 4 days for full effect. Take Amazon Basic Care Lansoprazole Delayed-Release Capsules 15 mg every day for 14 days to treat frequent heartburn (2 or more days a week).

SODIUM FREE: Amazon Basic Care Lansoprazole Delayed-Release Capsules 15 mg stops acid production at the source – the pumps that release acid into the stomach. These capsules are a sodium-free choice to treat frequent heartburn.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
